original_title: Sister Double Happiness: Greetings From Zürich
overview: Recorded live on September 24, 1993 in Switzeraland. Tracks: Bobby Shannon, Don't Worry,  Lightning, Ashes, Exposed to You, San Diego, Freight Train, You Don't Know Me, Whipping Song,  No Good For You, Dicks Hate Police and Two-Headed Dog
title: Sister Double Happiness: Greetings From Zürich
